name: Whose dream is it?
description:
"Whose dream is it?" is a dream exploration game heavily influenced by LSD: Dream Emulator and Yume Nikki. Game was made by 2 authors in 2 months especially for LSDJAM-2020.

In this game, you can explore about 9 various locations and interact with their environments.

Unfortunately, we didn't have enough time to finish the game and it was constructed in a hurry, maps are half done and there are almost no events at all, but we hope you will enjoy what was done anyway! 

I hope game will receive an update within a week.

Game was tested on Linux x64/arm64, Windows x64, but it should also work on Linux arm32, macOS and Windows x86. By the way, can anyone check how the game works on monitors with a high refresh rate, such as 144Hz?

Controls:

WASD - walk
Shift - run
Space - jump
LMB - interact
ESC - back
Enter - confirm
F2 - save screenshot
F11 - toggle fullscreen
